title: Special Recognition Award
description: Awarded for outstanding scientific contribution and significant innovation in leveraging speech-based AI for early cognitive impairment detection.

title: Explainability Award
description: Recognized for developing transparent and interpretable modeling techniques, enabling clinicians to understand how AI-driven predictions are generated.

title: Code Cleaning & Reproducibility Award
description: Awarded for delivering high-quality, well-structured, reproducible, and well-documented code across the entire submission pipeline.
